snippet: The new Yayoi Kusama retrospective opening Thursday at the Whitney Museum of American Art serves as reminder that the aggressive melding of art with fashion, what seemed to be a relatively recent phenomenon, is not really recent at all.
abstract: The new Yayoi Kusama retrospective opening Thursday at the Whitney Museum of American Art serves as reminder that the aggressive melding of art with fashion, what seemed to be a relatively recent phenomenon, is not really recent at all.

headline.main: Kusama Retrospective Is New Exhibit for an Old Idea
